The New Frontier of Efficiency

How AI & Automation Are Transforming Every Industry

A Flagship Executive Report by MRE Consulting & Insurance

Executive Summary

This comprehensive white paper analyzes AI and automation opportunities across 20+ industries with ROI benchmarks from McKinsey, PwC, Gartner, Deloitte, and IBM.

Key Findings:

  • .7 trillion in global GDP potential from automation by 2030
  • 45% of daily business operations are automatable with existing technology
  • 42% average efficiency gain and 37% cost reduction in firms using AI-enhanced workflows
  • 250-400% ROI over two years for early adopters

Industries Covered:

  • Accounting & Tax Firms
  • Insurance Agencies & Brokerages
  • Real Estate & Property Management
  • Construction & Home Services
  • Healthcare Revenue Cycle
  • Legal Practices
  • And 14 more industries...
